name: Formula Racing Car Adventure
description:
Formula Racing Car Adventure is an amazing f1 GP racing game. You will have a real experience of racing while playing this game. Racing is a famous sport worldwide and most people like to play the f1 games to have a real experience of the formula 1 racing so this game is for those who are crazy about the formula games.

Formula Racing Car Adventur is a full package of a car racing game. The game has 2 modes one is racing and the other one is knockout. Both the modes have 10 levels. You have to win every level to unlock the next level that’s how you will be a race king. The racing arena is made quite beautiful with fully 3d graphics. We have included the original formula cars like Ferrari, Mercedes, Red Bull Renault, Torro Rosso Renault and the McLaren. You have the opportunity to drive these wonderful cars and show your skills during the racing and beat your opponents in the racing arena. The opponents are hard so you have to run fast to get to the number one spot.

Formula Racing Car Adventur is a different kind of game. You may have played the different bike race games or other motorsports game but this one is hot pursuit game. It’s also different from those truck simulator games or zombie car games it's only a formula car game the best formula 2017 game. The game is full of entertainment and challenging tracks. Car shifting through the lanes at the right time is an art during the racing so be careful while car shifting your car can get crashed. You can do a stunt drive by making the car jump from the ramps included in the tracks and perform a dangerous car stunt. You can get bonus points with the car stunts from the car jump during the stunt drive.

Race through the traffic rush because there is no free way for you. There is no limit of time in the racing mode during the runtime. You can upgrade your car wheels when you have earned some money by winning the races. It’s a happy wheels game. You may read somewhere that you earn to die so don’t waste your time and drive the formula cars on the dangerous hill climbing tracks. At the start of the game, only one car is unlocked so you have to earn the money to unlock remaining 4 cars. Race through the high streets and show some formula drifts with your car.

Key Features:
• Amazing 3d graphics and original formula car sounds
• Five formula one cars
• Two gaming modes: knockout and racing
• Switching controls option (tilt, steering, and arrows)
• Ten levels in both modes
• Best paid game in cheap money
• Add free game
• Customize your car and upgrade it

How to play:
• Install the game from app store
• Open the game and select play
• Choose the mode
• Select the level
• Start the race with your desired control and beat the opponents
